FITNESS THAT
WORKS FOR YOU.


GymRush connects Personal Trainers with individuals and groups aspiring to improve their fitness. Find, schedule, stay connected and reach your goals with GymRush app.

TRAINERS AND INSTRUCTORS

WE’RE CRAFTING AN EXPERIENCE JUST FOR YOU - RushPRO.


RushPRO is woven right into GymRush app – build your personal training business faster, connect and monitor your clients’ progress 24/7, get more control over your schedule, and avoid the high fees from the local gym. If you’re goal is to grow and build a sustainable Personal Training business, GymRush and RushPRO can help you get there.


Help build the future of GymRush app. Sign up for the RushPro app closed beta testing group now. On approval, you’ll have early access to new builds and features, and have the opportunity to share your input and shape the future of the RushPRO experience and GymRush app

TRAINEES

ACHIEVE YOUR FITNESS GOALS BY CONNECTING WITH A RUSHPRO TRAINER.


Are you an individual or group looking to improve your fitness? We’ve created an experience for you within GymRush app! It’s called RushLIVE, and we can’t wait to see what you do with it. Track your progress, connect with your RushPRO Trainer, and achieve your fitness goals with the ease and power of RushLIVE



Help build the future of GymRush app. Sign up for the RushPro app closed beta testing group now. On approval, you’ll have early access to new builds and features, and have the opportunity to share your input and shape the future of the RushPRO experience and GymRush app

TOGETHER, THE PERFECT SUCCESS FORMULA

RushPRO + RushLIVE


Both Trainer and Trainee log into GymRush app. Trainers receive the RushPRO experience. Trainees, RushLIVE experience. Both Trainer and Trainee use GymRush to connect, share, and maintain their fitness programs. Seamless connectivity between Trainer and Trainee – 24/7 reporting, user stat analytics, messaging, book appointments and more. All in the palm of your hand.
